casebody.data:
Kim THOMSON
v.
DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017 James V. Sabalini, in support of the petition. Matthew F. Larock, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn.App. 122 , 169 A.3d 256 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
